statements: DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 AND sale_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE product_name = 'Laptop' OR product_name = 'Phone'
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE sales_id = 100 AND sale_amount > 500.00
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date < '2022-01-01')
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01' AND product_id = 100;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 500 AND email = 'example@email.com';
